name: Brittle Buildings
description:
Brittle buildings is a cross between tower-defense and platformer-shooter!    Modify your buildings with unique modules and balance your building's stability!   Defend against hordes of enemies! Controls

Movement: WASD

Jumping: Spacebar

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: MB left

Action: E

Rotate module: MB right

Developers

Game: JBroook (https://twitter.com/j_broook)

Music and Audio: WolfMeryX (https://twitter.com/WolfMeryX)

Art: Scummy (https://twitter.com/Scummy65118875)
